mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into failure_instance (gmt_create, gmt_modified, def_id, app_instance_id, app_component_instance_id, incident_id, name, level, gmt_occur, gmt_recovery, content ) values (#{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{defId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{appInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appComponentInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{incidentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtOccur,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtRecovery,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

select DATE_FORMAT(gmt_occur, #{dateFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) aggTime, count(1) as cnt from failure_instance where
app_instance_id = #{appInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
gmt_occur >= #{startTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and gmt_occur <= #{endTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} group by aggTime
